reviewText: I HAD THE DOTHAN TOUR WHILE I WAS IN IN THE ARMY.
This was a perfect gift for my Dad!  He really loved it!  It gives him hours of enjoyment!  Perfect purchase!!  :)

Specialists in lesser known programmers and 'B' unit films, Pennsylvania-based ALPHA VIDEO is owned by Jerry Greene, founder of Collectable Records. Quality of their unrestored movie transfers varies from fair to good, based on condition of source material stock (often old 16mm broadcast prints). The only extras provided are a catalog insert and DVD-accessible title list. . As the star halfback of Alabama's Crimson Tide, Johnny Brown appeared on WHEATIES cereal boxes in 1927. The handsomely muscular Brown made an easy transition to films, co-starring with Mary Pickford in COQUETTE (1929), her first "talkie." John (as he was billed) obtained his own notoriety with King Vidor's early widescreen western, BILLY THE KID (1930). Perhaps MGM reassessed his acting ability and chances of becoming a leading man, for Brown was fired from LAUGHING SINNERS (1931) and his scenes redone by newcomer Clark Gable. Cut loose, John worked briefly for PARAMOUNT, UNIVERSAL, WARNER's, FOX and COLUMBIA, then at a number of 'B' film companies, in particular SUPREME, where as a western movie star he was now Johnny Mack Brown. Alpha's JOHNNY MACK BROWN COLLECTION is ten one-hour western programmers, the majority of them produced by Supreme Pictures (a Poverty Row studio) and shot on the Iverson and other Southern California ranches. SYNOPSES In BAR-Z BAD MEN, a duplicitous foreman throws in with the town's richest citizen to steal an honest rancher's spread. In BOOTHILL BRIGADE, a crooked rancher with a crew of hired killers tries to force other cattlemen off their own property. In BRANDED A COWARD, his first for Supreme Pictures, Johnny must overcome the traumatic childhood memory of seeing his family murdered before he can take vengeance on those responsible, the 'Cat' and his outlaw gang. As THE COURAGEOUS AVENGER, Johnny investigates a series of bullion shipment heists and learns that a mine owner is behind them, also that he's using kidnapped men as slave labor. Johnny's gold mine partner in THE CROOKED TRAIL is a former outlaw who can't seem to break old habits. In LAWLESS LAND, Johnny and a couple of old-timers track down the gang of a man who murdered the town's sheriff. Johnny's a former outlaw in A LAWMAN IS BORN who's working as a store clerk when the town's sheriff is gunned down. After he accepts the tin star, Johnny's past comes back to haunt him. THE LONE STAR TRAIL is a Universal western in which Johnny's a falsely imprisoned rancher who returns home after two years. Now a parolee who by law cannot wear a gun, Johnny and Marshal Tex Ritter tackle a gang that's trying to take gain control of the valley before a dam is completed. Johnny goes undercover in ROGUE OF THE RANGE as a convict who helps a gang leader escape. Now a member of the crew, Johnny's in serious trouble when it's discovered that he and the sheriff plan to bring the gang to justice. In the Monogram programmer THE TEXAS KID, one of two lawmen on the hunt for a stagerobbing outfit doesn't know that one of these criminals is an undercover U.S. Marshal. Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 IMDb viewer poll ratings.
